InstructionOfMain: Please select the UID for the first-time use. After enabling the loop, the password will be copied and the system will automatically switch to the next account.
placeholderUid: A 9-digit UID consisting of only numbers
placeholderAccount: An 11-digit phone number or email address
placeholderPassword: 8-15 characters, can only contain two of the following: letters, English symbols, and numbers
tipshelper: The maximum character limit for the remark function is 400 words.
modifyhelper0: Double-click the corresponding content to modify or delete. After modifying the account, be sure to
modifyhelper1: Click the Store button to archive the changes.
